content.raw:
Thanks for the ping @{557058:90bc87b0-2886-4377-a17c-3a6629a697ff} ! I updated the macro accordingly. Though, I cannot access anymore the logs, can you please provide a new link?

Then, should I rebase this PR on top of `ign-gazebo3` \(citadel\)? I’m not very familiar with hg. In this case would changing the target branch in the top of the PR and merging `ign-gazebo3` be enough?
content.html:
Thanks for the ping @Addisu Z. Taddese ! I updated the macro accordingly. Though, I cannot access anymore the logs, can you please provide a new link?

Then, should I rebase this PR on top of ign-gazebo3 (citadel)? I’m not very familiar with hg. In this case would changing the target branch in the top of the PR and merging ign-gazebo3 be enough?
